content: cast on 8 sts row 1 purl row 2 increase 1 7 times k1 15 sts row 3 - 9 beg with a purl row st-st 7 row row 10 k1 ssk k10 k2tog 13 sts row 11 purl row 12 k1 ssk k8 k2tog 11 sts row 13 purl row 14 k1 ssk k6 k2tog 9 sts b & t with right side of st-st outside fold wings in half and over sew row ends together position and sew the wings onto the penguin s body feet make two using orange yarn cast on 4 sts row 1 increase 1 k1 increase 1 k1 6 sts row 2 - 5 beg with a purl row st-st 4 row row 6 k2tog yrn k2tog 2 times 5 sts copyright © 2014 sarah gasson www knitables com row 7 - 11 beg with a knit row st-st 5 row b&t with right side of st-st outside fold feet in half and oversew the side edges together position and sew the feet onto the penguin beak using orange yarn cast on 10 sts row 1 k2 ssk k2 k2tog k2 8 sts row 2 p1 p2tog p2 ssp p1 6 sts b&t sew the side seam of the beak and position and sew the beak onto the penguin with black yarn embroider two small eyes as illustrated copyright © 2014 sarah gasson www knitables com
